name: Rogue Cowboy Vs Alien View releases overview
name_original: Rogue Cowboy Vs Alien View releases overview
description:
No Alien Will Attack As long As This Sherif In Town 

Shoot Alien Ships with your Special Gun !! Kill there Boss Ship

This CowBoy Wont Go Down So Easy

- Aim, Shoot, Move, Jump

- Two Exciting Levels.

- Very cool graphics and feel

- Unlimited fun!

How to play ?

 Left Right Arrows To Move, Space to jump,  Mouse Click To Aim and Shoot
